name: Flappy Parrot (itch)
description:
Story:

Mitu is a brave parrot he lives in a Pakistan beautiful Mountain Valley. One day Mitu fly to find food he enters the dark dangerous mountain cave. The cave is full of sharp rocks. Mitu is trapped in this dangerous cave and its mission to escape this cave there seems no way out.

Description:

Flappy Parrot is a cute addictive platform game where your one and only goal is to keep the bird alive by avoiding the mountain rocks for as long as you can. Help parrot to begin the adventure.

How to Play:

Tap the screen to Tap or flap Parrot and try to avoid obstacles and get as far as possible.
